# tf.contrib.summary.generic


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py#L736-L754">

</td></table>



Writes a tensor summary if possible.

``` python
tf.contrib.summary.generic(
    name,
    tensor,
    metadata=None,
    family=None,
    step=None
)
```
